scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js && node ./src/inline.js && cp ./src/index.html ./dist/index.html && cp ./src/page.js ./dist/page.js && cp ./src/roboto-mono.ttf ./dist/roboto-mono.ttf && cp ./src/left-arrow.png ./dist/left-arrow.png && cp ./src/settings-cog.png ./dist/settings-cog.png && cp ./src/info.png ./dist/info.png && cp ./src/toggle-on.png ./dist/toggle-on.png && cp ./src/toggle-off.png ./dist/toggle-off.png
